title: 203 - Misunderstanding the Bible - With Tim Gombis
description:
Mike and Bonnie respond to a criticism on how political issues have been handled tonally in the past. Then Mike sits down once again with Pauline Scholar Tim Gombis to further discuss the ways in which folks have and do misunderstood the Bible.
 
Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
